snippet.title: The Haunting of Joni Evers - Trailer 2 - Indie Horror Showcase
snippet.description:
The Haunting of Joni Evers is a psychologically thrilling strollplayer (or walking simulator). Step into Joni's shoes to face the past and break the curse descended on the Cunningham House in this emotional tale of estranged family steeped in a malevolent haunting.

Coming 2024 • Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2828590/The_Haunting_of_Joni_Evers/

#IndieGame #IndieGames #storygame #walkingsimulator
